Package model

Class Rect

java.lang.Object
model.Entity
model.Rect
Direct Known Subclasses:
Collider, HealthBar, Sprite
public class Rect extends Entity
Rect types of Entity allow for representing an entity as a rectangle instead of just a point. This means that the extending object can have access to rectangle properties such as widths, heights, and centers. This is useful for colliders and sprites as both can be modelled using rectangles.
